name: Cecchini et al., Appellants, v. Elko

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Cecchini et al., Appellants, v. Elko.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. See Act No. 165, approved July 16, 1968. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: A, J. Rosenbleet, City Solicitor, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Cecchini et al., Appellants, v. Elko.
Argued April 23, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Samuel J. Goldstein, for appellants.
A, J. Rosenbleet, City Solicitor, for appellees.
October 3, 1968:
